definition: cannot help laughing/unable to restrain a smile
too weak to stand up to the wind (idiom); extremely delicate/fragile state of health

sentences.english: A good ice, good cold, I can not help I called chills.
sentences.chinese: 好冰，好凉，我不禁打了个冷颤。

sentences.english: My parents speak and act like "old children", often make people laugh.
sentences.chinese: 我父母的说话做事像个“老顽童”，常让人忍俊不禁。

sentences.english: The interior of a Leather Tanner's workshop can make strong men retch.
sentences.chinese: 制革工坊内部的恶臭令壮汉亦不禁窒息。

sentences.english: I was frightened at the sound.
sentences.chinese: 我听到那声音不禁大吃一惊。

sentences.english: The indomitable spirit of man also cant help tears.
sentences.chinese: 这个顶天立地的男人也不禁泪如雨下。

sentences.english: Tamitha, who had diabetes and ulcers, began to tremble.
sentences.chinese: 患有糖尿病和溃疡的塔米莎不禁冷得开始打颤。

sentences.english: My friend was on her feet now, with one unbelieving hand against her mouth.
sentences.chinese: 我的朋友不禁站起身，惊讶得用手捂住了嘴巴。

sentences.english: Looking up into the sky, the players can not help stratagem to mind.
sentences.chinese: 抬头望向天空，队员们不禁计上心来。

sentences.english: So bound home from Providence alone, I was groaning to myself on the train.
sentences.chinese: 我独自从普罗维登斯返回，不禁在火车上喟然叹息。

sentences.english: It was impossible for her to see the word without thinking of Pemberley and its owner.
sentences.chinese: 她看到这个地名，就不禁想到彭伯里和彭伯里的主人。

sentences.english: It was such a simple answer that Koppel had to smile.
sentences.chinese: 回答得如此简单，科佩尔不禁笑了。

sentences.english: “Hey!” Annabel laughed at how Julia looked.
sentences.chinese: 安娜贝利看着茱莉亚的样子不禁大笑起来。

sentences.english: Great genes, I muttered to myself.
sentences.chinese: 我不禁喃喃自语，果然是强大的基因。

sentences.english: I woke up from a dream to walk through the bamboo forest, can not help but feel sad and dreary up.
sentences.chinese: 我从梦中醒来漫步于竹林之间，心里不禁悲凉起来。

sentences.english: Touch of Idiocy no longer permits Heighten, as it has no save.
sentences.chinese: 愚钝之触将不禁升阶了，因为其无豁免。

sentences.english: Thought of here, son can't help some collateral.
sentences.chinese: 想到这里，儿子不禁有些神伤。

definition: to sigh with sorrow, regret etc/rueful/deeply moved
to recall/to think of/to call to mind
indeed/truly/(coll.) (used to express disapproval, annoyance etc about sth)
cannot help laughing/unable to restrain a smile
